name: UIKey
desc: An object that provides information about the state of a keyboard key.

items.name: var keyCode: UIKeyboardHIDUsage
items.desc: The HID usage code of the key.

items.name: var modifierFlags: UIKeyModifierFlags
items.desc: The modifier keys pressed and held while the user presses the key.

items.name: var characters: String
items.desc: A string that represents the text value of the key combined with any active modifier keys.

items.name: var charactersIgnoringModifiers: String
items.desc: A string that represents the text value of the key without modifier keys.
